Package blackjack_req

package blackjack_req
  • Class
    Description
    Card
    Card class Card glass gets value from enum value and suit of the card from enum suit
    Deck
    Class deck This class creates an array of cards, Also it adds 52 cards to a deck, When calling shuffleDeck function shuffles the deck using random, Gives cards to a player or a dealer
    Hand
    Class hand Class hand created to store cards which player or dealer has in hands
    Suit
    Enum for values of suit Has values of suits of the cards Needed in the card class
    Table
    Class table Creates a table with parameters such as maximal bet and minimal bet
    Value
    Enum for values of cards Has values of suits of the cards Needed in the card class
